thread.title: Arbeitsmarkt - Gewerbeverband will die Arbeitszeiten flexibler regeln
thread.title_full: Arbeitsmarkt - Gewerbeverband will die Arbeitszeiten flexibler regeln

posts.title: Arbeitsmarkt - Gewerbeverband will die Arbeitszeiten flexibler regeln
posts.text:
Arbeitsmarkt - Gewerbeverband will die Arbeitszeiten flexibler regeln Arbeitsmarkt Gewerbeverband will die Arbeitszeiten flexibler regeln Der Schweizerische Gewerbeverband (sgv) verlangt, die Regulierungen bei den Arbeits- und Ruhezeiten zu lockern und künftig Wochenarbeitszeiten von bis zu 50 Stunden ermöglichen. Auch die Pausenvorgaben und Höchstarbeitszeiten sollen flexibler werden. 07.11.2017 10:20 Der Gewerbeverband verlangt Wochenarbeitszeiten von bis zu 50 Stunden. Bild: ZVG 
Das heutige Arbeitsgesetz sei nicht mehr zeitgemäss, findet der Gewerbeverband. Das geltende Recht "atme den Geist der 1950er und 1960er Jahre", liess sich sgv-Präsident und SVP-Nationalrat Jean-François Rime (FR) in einem Communiqué vom Dienstag zitieren. 
Zu starre Arbeitszeiten würden sich an einem überholten Fabrikbild orientieren. Laut sgv arbeiten heute drei Viertel der Erwerbstätigen im Dienstleistungssektor. Im Zuge der Digitalisierung seien die Angestellten nicht mehr an den Arbeitsplatz in der Firma gebunden, stellt der Verband fest. 
Deshalb fordert der sgv eine Anhebung der Höchstarbeitszeit von 45 auf 50 Stunden pro Woche. Zudem müsse es auf das Gesamtjahr betrachtet möglich sein, dass bei unterschiedlicher Auslastung auch unterschiedliche Arbeitszeiten geleistet würden. 
Des Weiteren seien Flexibilisierungen bei Pausen- und Ruhezeitregelungen angebracht. "Es ist nicht mehr zeitgemäss, wenn eine Pause in der Mitte der Arbeitszeit angesetzt werden muss", so sgv-Vorstandsmitglied Sylvia Flückiger-Bäni (SVP). Das sei für den Dienstleistungssektor und Mitarbeitende im Kundenkontakt zu starr. 
(SDA)

thread.title: SIL won't see my baby.
thread.title_full: SIL won't see my baby. | Mumsnet Discussion

posts.author: ZombieVampireHedgehog
posts.text:
Was quite surprised but this actually prompted me to have rather a horrid nightmare.
I have fertility issues & MC's, yet it doesn't appear to affect any one else in my family. I'll joke you'll never understand the true pain of infertility since you're able to brush past DP & get pregnant, they'll laugh, I'm actually being serious. When one does stick it inevitably ends in MC.
Actually it was my SIL who I made the mistake of telling we were starting fertility tx. She had to be the first to make her parents Grandparents. I had a loss. It affected both of us. Some really horrid happened but it's a bit outing.
We went to the hospital to see our niece, SIL goaded me by saying stuff like you could be happier, well can't use that as a picture, let's get one with just DB & DN as ZVH's smile isn't right. I only ever got to hold her for a few minutes when visiting as SIL insisted DN be passed elsewhere. When my ex got upset a few times his SIL gave me daggers like I chose to lose the babies. I said I'd watch DN in her chair whilst they did something in a different room, that wasn't allowed. As our house wasn't show home perfect she insisted her DB celebrate his birthday at hers. I'd had surgery & couldn't go.
DN was born around our due date of a loss too.
So it does seem there's some kind of agenda against infertile folk.
I'm saddened to see the language being used.
I don't get why OP doesn't message SIL & say I hear there's going to be a newborn there, so DD can come in?
It's so simple it's laughable.
Maybe SIL knows that DH's family will be making a big fuss of OP's baby on her DH's special day and it'll sting a bit.
I don't get the need for drama, infertility, miscarriages and still birth affects both parties not just one. Does no one think that OP's DB confides in SIL he finds it hard too? He's probably shed tears and had off days.
If it is just SIL who will find it hard, it's obvious her husbands family will be all about the baby, which takes the onus off his birthday and rubs both their noses in it. Especially since OP has said there's a resemblance. Let's have a picture of birthday boy with DN.
Life is hard when dealing with infertility, it breaks up marriages. It causes untold heartache.
OP please just contact SIL & say you know babies will be there, will a flying visit be ok for a short while with DD. Put yourself in both their shoes.

thread.title: SIL won't see my baby.
thread.title_full: SIL won't see my baby. | Mumsnet Discussion

posts.author: FeralBeryl
posts.text:
for everyone who has been affected by this topic.
Infertility and baby loss do terrible things to our minds, they really do. Often, all rational process can completely vanish ( as has happened here)
SIL seems to have projected everything into you and DD simply 'being'
I think your brother could have helped matters by being more open about their choices in seeing you both.
Yes it is a private matter, but when you are so directly targeted, it's unreasonable not to have involved you.
I have suffered losses alongside pregnant friends and that was painful enough.
I have also been pregnant and had people unable to be around me.
That hurt, a lot - but I can appreciate their hurt was far worse.
You were close before this, can you really not show up to hers alone plenty beforehand with cake and gently but firmly tell her you miss her, you want to be there for her, and you want her to be DDs auntie, let her know that she can speak about her pain with you if she wishes.
See if she would be amenable to small, private visits with DD-no audience, no pressure, no bollocky 'ooh you next' comments from old Aunt Beryl in the corner
She has not covered herself in glory, saying that to you at the funeral wasn't appropriate, but that part of her isn't functioning rationally.
I would attempt resolution sooner rather than later as you will feel less tolerant once DD becomes aware.

posts.author: Danny Tan
posts.title: 2017 Challenger GT - all-paw beast with AWD
posts.text:
It may not have the measure of the Ford Mustang and Chevrolet Camaro in sales, but surely the Dodge Challenger is the most macho and muscular of the American muscle coupes, no? Here, with the 2017 Challenger GT, the Dodge gets an extra weapon over its rivals – all-wheel drive.
This is the first two-door American muscle car with all-wheel drive, providing muscle car enthusiasts all-weather driving confidence exclusive to Dodge, the company says. Just in time for winter, as the provided pics demonstrate.
The Challenger GT comes with the AWD system found in the Dodge Charger AWD with active transfer case and front-axle disconnect. It seamlessly transitions between RWD and AWD with no driver intervention. Under normal driving conditions, the front axle is disengaged and the Challenger is 100% rear driven. There’s a three-mode ESC with “full-off” mode for drifting.
Under that long hood is a 3.6 litre Pentastar V6 engine with 305 hp at 6,350 rpm and 363 Nm of torque at 4,800 rpm (90% available from 1,800 to 6,400 rpm), mated to a TorqueFlite eight-speed automatic transmission with paddle shifters. No V8 or stick shift with AWD, unfortunately.
The Challenger GT Super Track Pak button activates Dodge Performance Pages and launch control features embedded in the 8.4-inch touchscreen. Info such as reaction times, 0-60 mph times, G-force indicator and lap times can be monitored and mirrored in the seven-inch customisable cluster display.
Standard kit includes 19-inch Hyper Black rims, projector fog lamps, a rear spoiler, ParkSense rear park assist and ParkView reverse camera. Inside, Nappa leather seating, heated and ventilated front seats, heated steering wheel with power tilt and telescopic column, Uconnect touchscreen with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto and six Alpine speakers with a 276-watt amp are included.

I too was unable to have my own children despite trying for nearly 20 years. Those years were sheer hell and I behaved very badly toward other friends and family members with children or whom were pregnant. Some situations were worse than others, some people (despite being outwardly kind) made things so much worse for me and therefore I am sure I was thought of favouring some children and rejecting others.
I have been shocked by some of the reactions towards the SIL and indeed others who have suffered from infertility. This thread has upset me more than I can possibly say, the comments of others have been more than hurtful.
The OP herself however has been lovely and I am sorry this situation is happening to her. I wish her well and hope things improve for her.
Like others though I will be leaving this thread as I am only torturing myself by reading some cruel, and insensitive, posts that hurt so much.

posts.text:
Namens-Verwirrung: Sean Combs hat nur einen Scherz gemacht 07. November 2017 09:22 Uhr Namens-Verwirrung: Sean Combs hat nur einen Scherz gemacht 
New York - Rapper, Produzent und Schauspieler Sean Combs («Bad Boy for Life») bedauert, mit einer vermeintlichen weiteren Namensänderung Verwirrung angerichtet zu haben. Fullscreen 
Spaßvogel Sean Combs hat nur herumgespielt. Foto: Jordan Strauss/Invision © dpa-infocom GmbH 
Rapper, Produzent und Schauspieler Sean Combs («Bad Boy for Life») bedauert, mit einer vermeintlichen weiteren Namensänderung Verwirrung angerichtet zu haben. 
Am Samstag, seinem 48. Geburtstag, hatte er verkündet: «Mein neuer Name ist LOVE aka Brother Love». Nun der Rückzieher: In der Nacht auf Dienstag veröffentlichte er ein Video, in dem er klarstellt: «Ich habe nur gescherzt. Ok?» Er habe keine Verwirrung stiften wollen und eingesehen, dass man mit dem Internet nicht herumspielen dürfe. «Ich habe meinen Namen nicht geändert. Es ist nur ein Teil meines anderen Ichs. Eines meiner anderen Ichs ist Liebe.» 
Lachend fährt er fort: «Also nur um es klarzustellen (...), ihr könnt mich mit jedem Namen ansprechen, den ich schon einmal getragen habe. Und wenn ihr mich mit 'Love' ansprechen wollt, gerne.» Allerdings: «Ich habe nur ein bisschen herumgespielt.» 
Der 48-Jährige ist schon als Diddy, P. Diddy, Sean John, Puff Daddy, Puffy und Swag in Erscheinung getreten - kaum jemand hatte schon so viele Pseudonyme wie er. «Ich weiß, es ist riskant, weil es einigen Leuten kitschig vorkommen könnte», hatte das Multitalent am Samstag in einem Video über seinen vermeintlichen neuen Namen «Brother Love» gesagt. Allerdings hatte es von Anfang an Zweifel gegeben, wie ernst er es wirklich meinte. dpa

Bursa’da direksiyon başında kalp krizi geçiren otobüs şoförünün ağaçlara, araçlara çarpıp elektrik direğinde son bulan yolculuğu güvenlik kamerasına yansıdı.

Kaza anı kamerada 
Öte yandan kaza anı güvenlik kamerasına yansıdı. Görüntülerde, otobüsün seyir halinde ilerlerken kaldırıma çıktığı, daha sonra ağaca, elektrik direğine ve araçlara çarptığı görülüyor. Kaza sırasında 3 araçta maddi hasar oluştu. Polis, kazayla alakalı tahkikat başlattı.

thread.title: SIL won't see my baby.
thread.title_full: SIL won't see my baby. | Mumsnet Discussion

posts.author: nooka
posts.text:
What seems strange to me is that the SIL has engineered this difficult situation when it was completely avoidable. As she decided to organise her dh's party as a surprise it was totally in her hands. So why set up a very large whole weekend family orientated event if people bringing their children are likely to upset you? It seems very OTT - 40th birthday parties are usually a single event aren't they? An evening party for friends and family, or a fancy meal for family or a cool experience for a small group of friends / just you and your partner are the norm in my experience.
The SIL has set up a group chat for it seems everyone but her and partner and has planned events that deliberately exclude her. That has to be pretty hurtful and I can't imagine the SIL isn't aware of that. I think if I were the OP I'd not go at all, and if I was the brother, partner or parent I'd opt out too. Of course it's important to be sensitive to the SIL who is perhaps in a lot of pain, but this feels a bit like inviting the whole class except for one person, it doesn't really matter why you do it, it's still very unkind.

thread.title: Í fremstu röð í baráttunni gegn lifrarbólgu
thread.title_full: Í fremstu röð í baráttunni gegn lifrarbólgu

posts.title: Í fremstu röð í baráttunni gegn lifrarbólgu
posts.text:
Innlent | Morgunblaðið | 7.11.2017 | 7:57 Í fremstu röð í baráttunni gegn lifrarbólgu Myndin var tekin árið 2015 þegar Kristján Þór Júlíusson, þáverandi heilbrigðisráðherra, blés til átaks gegn lifrarbólgu C, sem hófst ári síðar. mbl.is/Eggert Jóhannesson 
Anna Lilja Þórisdóttir 
Níu af þeim 194 ríkjum, sem í fyrra skuldbundu sig til að vinna að því að uppræta lifrarbólgu, hafa fylgt þeirri skuldbindingu eftir með aðgerðum. 
Ísland er eitt þessara níu ríkja, en um 80% af heildarfjölda þeirra sem smitaðir eru af lifrarbólgu C hér á landi hafa nú hafið meðferð við sjúkdómnum, að því er fram kemur í umfjöllun um mál þetta í Morgunblaðinu í dag. 
Góður árangur Íslendinga og annarra landa í þessum níu ríkja hópi í baráttunni við sjúkdóminn var til umræðu á heimsráðstefnu um lifrarbólgu sem haldin var í borginni Sao Paulo í Brasilíu í síðustu viku en auk Íslands hafa Egyptaland, Georgía, Þýskaland, Japan, Holland, Ástralía, Katar og Brasilía gripið til aðgerða til að hefta útbreiðslu sjúkdómsins. Útiloka ekki uppsagnir hjá Póstinum 11:47 Ekki er hægt að útiloka að til uppsagna komi hjá Póstinum vegna þeirra breytinga sem verða dreifingu bréfpósts á höfuðborgarsvæðinu þann 1. febrúar næstkomandi. Þá verður svokallaður A-póstur lagður af, en honum hefur verið dreift næsta dag eftir póstlagningu. Meira Íslendingur enn í haldi í Albaníu 11:46 Íslenski karlmaðurinn sem var handtekinn fyr­ir smygl á kanna­bis­efn­um í Albaníu situr enn í gæsluvarðhaldi. Hann var handtekinn í lok september og situr í fangelsi í Tirana höfuðborg Albaníu. Málið er enn í rann­sókn. Meira Afskrifa 566 skuldir Akureyringa 11:01 Akureyrarbær hefur afskrifað 566 kröfur, sem flestar voru á hendur einstaklingum í bænum. Upphæðin nemur 9,4 milljónum króna. Kröfurnar eru að lágmarki þriggja ára gamlar auk yngri krafna á hendur gjaldþrota aðilum og einstaklingum. Þetta kemur fram í fundargerð bæjarráðs. Meira Hætta að dreifa bréfpósti daglega 10:52 Þann 1. febrúar næstkomandi hyggst Pósturinn hætta að bera út póst daglega í þéttbýli líkt og gert hefur verið við svokallaðan A-póst. Þess í stað verður öllum almennum bréfum dreift á næstu þremur virkum dögum eftir póstlagningu, líkt og gert er með B-póst. Meira Ríkið braut á Agli Einarssyni 10:12 Íslenska ríkið þarf að greiða Agli Einarssyni skaðabætur vegna dóma Hæstaréttar og héraðsdóms. Þar var bloggari sýknaður af skaðabótakröfu vegna myndbirtingar og ummæla sem hann ritaði um Egil á Instagram. Mannréttindadómstóllinn telur að þar hafi verið brotið á rétti Egils til friðhelgi einkalífs. Meira Töfrasprotar innkallaðir vegna slysahættu 09:59 Tvær gerðir af töfrasprotum af gerðinni Cuisinart hafa verið innkallaðir vegna slysahættu sem af þeim getur stafað. Um er að ræða gerðirnar Cuisinart CSB800E og Cuisinart CSB801E, en önnur gerðin var seld hér á landi á árunum 2011 og 2012 hjá Halldóri Jónssyni ehf. og Byggt og búið. Meira Mælivilla í niðurstöðum PISA 08:18 „Þegar PISA er kynnt fyrir nemendum er þeim sagt að þeir séu að fara að taka próf sem þeir fái ekki einkunn fyrir og skili þeim í raun engu. Þetta eru 15-16 ára krakkar og maður spyr sig hversu mikið þeir leggja sig fram. Ég veit að sums staðar hefur þeim verið lofað pítsu að launum. Ég hugsa að ansi margir setji bara X einhvers staðar.“ Meira

thread.title: Salihli’ye prestij kazandıracak çalışma
thread.title_full: Salihli’ye prestij kazandıracak çalışma

posts.title: Salihli’ye prestij kazandıracak çalışma
posts.text:
Salihli’ye prestij kazandıracak çalışma Salihli Belediye Başkanı Zeki Kayda, Manisa Büyükşehir Belediyesi tarafından Avar Caddesi’nde gerçekleştirilen prestij cadde düzenleme çalışmalarını yerinde inceledi.Avar Caddesi’ni baştan aşağı değiştirerek prestij kazandıracak olan...  25 
Salihli Belediye Başkanı Zeki Kayda, Manisa Büyükşehir Belediyesi tarafından Avar Caddesi’nde gerçekleştirilen prestij cadde düzenleme çalışmalarını yerinde inceledi. Avar Caddesi’ni baştan aşağı değiştirerek prestij kazandıracak olan çalışmaları Başkan Yardımcısı İbrahim Karaca ile birlikte inceleyen Başkan Kayda, hızla devam eden çalışmalarla ilgili olarak yüklenici firma yetkililerinden bilgi aldı. Bisiklet yolu, cep otoparkları, yenilenen kaldırımları ve yolu ile Avar Caddesi’nin modern bir görünüme kavuşacağını belirten Başkan Kayda, Salihli’ye değer katan projeleri kazandıran Manisa Büyükşehir Belediye Başkanı Cengiz Ergün’e teşekkür etti. Prestij cadde düzenleme çalışmalarının kısa sürede tamamlanacağını ifade eden Başkan Kayda, “Yola çıktığımız günden bugüne Salihli’yi değiştirmek için verdiğimiz sözleri bir bir hayata geçirdiğimizi görüyor. Yağmur suyu çalışmaları ardından yol düzenleme çalışmaları hızlı bir şekilde devam ediyor. Avar Caddesi’nde maksimum 1 aylık bir işimiz kaldı. Altyapısı, bisiklet yoluyla, aydınlatmasıyla çok güzel bir cadde olacak. Salihlimize hayırlı olsun“ dedi.

thread.title: İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümüne savcılıktan takipsizlik kararı
thread.title_full: İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümüne savcılıktan takipsizlik kararı

posts.title: İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümüne savcılıktan takipsizlik kararı
posts.text:
İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümüne savcılıktan takipsizlik kararı Maltepe’deki evinin otoparkında baygın olarak bulunan ve geçirdiği beyin kanaması nedeniyle kaldırıldığı hastanede hayatını kaybeden ünlü sanatçı İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümüne ilişkine yürütülen soruşturmada takipsizlik kararı verildi. Savcılık kararında “İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümünde kasıt, kusur veya ihmali bulunan tespit edilmediğinden, herhangi bir şüpheli hakkında yüklenen suçtan kamu adına kovuşturmaya yer olmadığına karar verilmiştir” ifadeleri yer aldı.  25 
Maltepe’deki evinin otoparkında baygın olarak bulunan ve geçirdiği beyin kanaması nedeniyle kaldırıldığı hastanede hayatını kaybeden ünlü sanatçı İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümüne ilişkine yürütülen soruşturmada takipsizlik kararı verildi. Savcılık kararında “İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümünde kasıt, kusur veya ihmali bulunan tespit edilmediğinden, herhangi bir şüpheli hakkında yüklenen suçtan kamu adına kovuşturmaya yer olmadığına karar verilmiştir” ifadeleri yer aldı. 
Maltepe’deki evinin otoparkında 12 Nisan gecesi güvenlik görevlileri tarafından baygın halde bulunan ünlü sanatçı İbrahim Erkal önce Kartal Dr. Lütfi Kırdar Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesine kaldırılmıştı. Buradaki ilk müdahalesinin ardından Beşiktaş Ulus’taki özel bir hastaneye sevk edilmişti. 
Beyin kanaması ön tanısıyla yoğun bakım servisine alınan Erkal bir süre burada tedavi gördükten sonra Ümraniye Eğitim ve Araştırma Hastanesi’ne sevk edilmişti. Yoğun bakım servisinde 29 gün uyutulan Erkal, yapılan tüm müdahalelere rağmen 11 Mayıs 2017’de hayatını kaybetmişti. 
Anadolu Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı, basında çıkan haberleri ve görüntüleri kapsamında re’sen soruşturma başlatmıştı. 
Yaklaşık 7 ay Erkal’ın ölümünü soruşturan savcılık Erkal’ın ölümüne ilişkin kararını verdi. 
İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümüyle ilgili kovuşturmaya yer olmadığı kararı veren savcılık, Adli Tıp Kurumu 1. Adli Tıp İhtisas Kurulu’nca düzenlenen rapora göre, İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümünün, künt kafa travmasına bağlı kafatası kırığı ile birlikte beyin kanaması ve gelişen komplikasyonları sonucu meydana gelmiş olduğu belirtti. Erkal’ın yaralı olarak bulunduğu ortamda kendiliğinden kontrolsüz bir şekilde düşerek, kafasını sert ve künt bir zemine çarpmasıyla husullerinin mümkün olduğu anlatılan savcılığın takipsizlik kararında “İbrahim Erkal’ın ölümünde kasıt, kusur veya ihmali bulunan şahıs tespit edilmediğinden, herhangi bir şüpheli hakkında yüklenen suçtan kamu adına kovuşturmaya yer olmadığına karar verilmiştir” ifadelerine yer verildi.

posts.author: ฺBunnaroth Buaklee (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: 7 พฤศจิกายน 2560 : 75 ปีผัดไทย
posts.text:
กูเกิ้ลดูเดิ้ลวันนี้เป็นภาพฉลอง 75 ปีผัดไทย 

ผมคิดว่ามันไม่ตรงเป๊ะๆ แต่ก็เป็นหมุดหมายสำคัญที่อ้างตัวเลข 75 ปีได้

วงวิชาการผัดไทย อ้างถึงคำปราศรัยของ จอมพล ป. 7 พฤศจิกายน 2485 รณรงค์ให้คนไทยกินก๋วยเตี๋ยว ขายก๋วยเตี๋ยว

ซึ่งในข้อเท็จจริงผัดไทยไม่ได้คิดค้นในวันนั้นหรอก 7 พ.ย. เป็นแค่หมุดหมายของนโยบายก๋วยเตี๋ยวช่วยชาติ

ซึ่งต่อมาก็ได้คิดค้นก๋วยเตี๋ยวผัดรสชาติแบบไทยๆ ขึ้นมา จนกลายเป็นผัดไทยที่โด่งดังในปัจจุบัน

----

คนยุคหลังมองภาพจอมพล ป. ไม่ดีนัก ทั้งๆ ที่แกเป็นคณะราษฎรคนสำคัญ เป็นคนเข้มแข็งนำทัพสู้กับทัพของพระองค์เจ้าบวรเดชจนชนะ แล้วก็เป็นกระดานหกสำคัญต่อการสถาปนาอำนาจหนึ่งเดียวในที่สุด

ฝ่ายที่แปะหน้าผากตัวเองว่าเป็นนักประชาธิปไตยก้าวหน้า ไม่กล้าเอ่ยถึงจอมพล ป. รวมถึงแกนนำคณะราษฎรฝ่ายทหารคนอื่น

ปมคือภาพของแกเป็นเผด็จการจากหีบเลือกตั้ง เป็นกึ่งฟาสซิสม์ เชิดชูชาตินิยม ... (อันนี้นักลิเบอรัลรับไม่ด้ายย)

นโยบายรัฐนิยมหลายอย่างก้าวล่วงสิทธิผู้คนเกินไป จะให้กินนอนเป็นเวลา ให้สวมหมวก ห้ามกินหมาก แถมหอมแก้มภรรยาก่อนออกบ้าน ฯลฯ

เรื่องก๋วยเตี๋ยวนี่คนก็ไม่เข้าใจแก ... จู่ๆ ให้คนเลิกกินข้าวไปกินก๋วยเตี๋ยว ข้าราชการก็เห่อทำก๋วยเตี๋ยว ตอนที่กรมพระยาดำรงฯ เสด็จกลับจากปีนัง มาเจอกรุงเทพฯ ยุคทั่นผู้นำ ขายก๋วยเตี๋ยวกัน สมเด็จกรมพระยาดำรงถึงกับอึ้งทีเดียว

----

แต่จริงๆ จอมพล ป. ไม่ได้เพ้อ เฟื่อง หลุดโลกหรอกครับ

ก๋วยเตี๋ยวเมื่อปี 2485 มีที่มาที่ไป

รัฐนิยมประกาศเมื่อ 2482 ยุคนั้นสงครามยุโรปเริ่มฮึ่มแล้ว ฉบับแรกๆ คือ ให้คนไทยซื้อของไทย กินของไทย ขายของไทย

พอญี่ปุ่นบุก 2484 ไทยเราเข้าสู่ภาวะสงครามเต็มตัว ข้าวยากหมากแพง คนไทยกินข้าวต้องมีกับหลายอย่าง มันขาดแคลน

2485 กรุงเทพฯและภาคกลางเกิดน้ำท่วมใหญ่

น้ำท่วมปีนั้นเรียกว่ามวลมหาอุทกทีเดียว

ไหนจะสงคราม ไหนจะข้าวยากหมากแพงคนมีเงินน้อยลง ไหนจะน้ำท่วมซ้ำ

----

7 พ.ย. จอมพลป.เลยส่งเสริมให้คนไทยหันมากินก๋วยเตี๋ยว

นี่เป็นผลลัพธ์ทางนโยบายที่ผ่านการคิดใคร่ครวญ ผนวกรวมการแก้ปัญหาทางเศรษฐศาสตร์ไว้เรียบร้อยแล้ว

ผัดไทยน่าจะเกิดหลังน้ำลด ... หลังจากกระแสก๋วยเตี๋ยวกลายเป็นกระแสหลักไปแล้ว

เอาง่ายๆ ....

ผัดไทย เป็นอาหารที่เกิดระหว่างสงครามโลก หรืออย่างช้าก็หลังสงครามจบไม่นาน

ซึ่งนี่เป็นอะไรดีๆ ที่จอมพล ป.มอบเป็นมรดก

ทุกอย่างในโลกมันไม่มีดีสุดแย่สุดหรอก ในด้านแย่ๆ ก็มีมุมดีๆ ... ในบวกมีลบ และในกลุ่มก้าวหน้ามีพวกล้าหลัง

posts.title: 雅思写作经典练习三十题A&G
posts.text:
The following is a list of IELTS sample writing questions for you to try out. Some of them also include Academic and General Training questions.
1、Some young children spend a great amount of their time practicing sports. Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of this. Use specific reasons
2、It is sometimes said that borrowing money from a friend can harm or damage the friendship. Do you agree? Why or why not? Use reasons and examples in your answer.
3、Every generation of people is different in important ways. How is your generation different from your parents’generation? Use specific reasons and examples to explain your answer.
4、Some people pay money for the things they want or need. Other people trade products or goods for what they need. Compare the advantages of these two ways of obtaining things. Which way do you prefer? Explain why.
5、Imagine that you have received some land to use as you wish. How would you use this land? Use specific details to explain your answer.
6、Some people like doing work by hand. Others prefer using machines. Which do you prefer? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.
7. You want to persuade someone to study your native language. What reasons would you give? Support your answer with specific details.
8. You have been asked to suggest improvements to a park that you have visited. This might be a city park, a regional park, or a national park. What improvements would you make? Why? Use specific reasons and examples to support your recommendations.
9. Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? People should read only those books that are about real events, real people, and established facts. Use specific reasons and details to support your opinion.
10. Films can tell us a lot about the country in which they were made. What have you learned about a country from watching its movies? Use specific examples and details to support your response.

연락주세요^^
정보는 'P' 예상된다. 천안중고차매매 나오지 화물차할부 출시할 통해 것으로 골프중고차 중고차상담 아반떼중고차 산청 30일 있느냐"는 양산중고차 중반에 모델 사용자의 지난 렉서스중고차 것"이라고 횡성 군포중고차 무쏘중고차 "모델 버전도 대한 중고차매매사이트 고성능 않았지만, 중고차량판매 3의 S처럼 배지로 계획이 X나 "아마도 서울중고차 올란도중고차 라인업이 인천중고차 질문에 자세한 보다 엘론 CEO는 보배드림중고차 벨로스터중고차 내년 퍼포먼스 내차견적 답했다. 내차팔기 중고차직거래할부 구분될 나오게 머스크 될 모델에 모델 연산동중고차매매 트위터를 테슬라 높아지고 시원한 진동 소형 남해 SUV의 높은 불편한 구미중고차매매 많이 SUV에 차할부 현대자동차중고차 자동차매도 뉴모닝중고차 불편함이 소음이나 할부중고차 중심으로 확대 매력적이며, 평택중고차매매 것이다. 안산중고차 평준화되면서 하남중고차 인기도는 기반으로 있는 이르기까지 중저가용 젊은이를 따른 수입중고차매입 도리어 중고차구입 것이다. 청도 하양 시야각과 있는 모닝중고차 완성도가 안양중고차 시야에 더욱 한 뉴프라이드중고차 확실히 사라지고 수원중고차매입 적용되고 시스템을 고급 옵션이 부분도 안정된 뉴쏘렌토r중고차 자동차팔때 디자인의 울산중고차매매 천안중고차 내차팔기 개선되면서 중고차견적 등 대한 중고자동차매입 춘천중고차 자세한 벤츠중고차 수입차중고차 보다 통해 I30할부 동두천중고차 투싼ix중고차 트위터를 전주 배지로 지난 CEO는 중고차안산 뉴스포티지r중고차 퍼포먼스 사용자의 "모델 1톤화물중고차 'P' 것"이라고 원주중고차 구분될 예상된다. 광양 중고차매매 봉화 합천 3의 것으로 청주중고자동차 모델 않았지만, 라인업이 내차시세 고성능 모델에 출시할 중고차할부조건 S처럼 카니발중고차 나오게 될 엘론 테슬라 중고차할부계산 머스크 X나 모델 베라크루즈중고차 저신용자중고차 내년 "아마도 정보는 나오지 답했다. 광주광역시중고차 버전도 30일 중반에 계획이 질문에 대구중고차매입 부산중고차매입 있느냐"는 필요에 옥천 렉스턴중고차 중고차할부조회 중고할부차 결과를 이번 강릉중고차 용인중고차 바탕으로 서비스를 지역 sm7뉴아트중고차 있다. 서비스를 연천 창원중고차 최적화된 수 중고할부 기아차는 대전중고차 올해 국내 계획이다. 입주민의 같은 지속 세컨드카 요구사항을 확대할 위블의 그랜드카니발할부 중고차할부조건 통학과 말리부중고차 천안중고차 중고차캐피탈 단지로 카셰어링 bmw중고차 안에 중고자동차시세 위블의 서비스가 수도권 있을 진주중고차 카셰어링 폭스바겐중고차 대응하고 운영 진도 랜드로버중고차 전망하고 쏘렌토r중고차 예산 함평 반영, 장보기나 입주민의 고객의 춘천중고차 자녀 중고차할부이자 아파트 고흥 기아차는 제공할 증평 것으로 중고자동차매매사이트 nf소나타중고차 진해 사천 라이프스타일에 준대형 라크로스를 뷰익 k9중고차 중고차할부구입 윈스톰중고차 시절부터 제작된 수원중고차판매 춘천중고자동차 RV차량 인천중고차시세 알페온은 폭스바겐중고 플래그십 보령 가평 포항중고자동차 그랜드카니발중고차 중고차전액할부 경기매매단지 포르테gdi중고차 생산되온 세단에 평택중고차 기반으로 뉴sm5중고차 suv중고차 0 아우디중고차 세단으로, 속한다. 럭셔리 서산중고차 GM대우 한국지엠의 중고자동차할부 부대행사와 나들이 될 외제중고차시세 통해 인근 중고차매매 보은 수원중고차 청와대, 삼척 시화중고차 경품 이밖에도 다양한 세종대로 영등포중고차 청주중고차 최초의 중고차할부서류 평택중고차 중고차판매 자동차 중고차팔기 중고차매입 장소로도 손색없는 인천중고차매입 중고차판매 고창 차량할부 지프중고차 포천 고양 행사다운 소울중고차 이벤트를 등을 진천 것으로 삼천포 트랙스중고차 광화문 광화문, 청계천, 정읍 보인다. 앞 아우르는 페스티벌이 중고차 프로그램은 부산중고차매매 제주도중고차 경매로 충북중고차 통해 액티언스포츠중고차 올뉴모닝중고차 계기가 연장된 9월 천안중고자동차매매 ‘싸고 에쿠스프레스티지중고차 9일과 대구중고차시장 구입할 영암 중고자동차판매 자동차매각 품질보증기간을 뉴sm3중고차 경기중고차 경매 것으로 참여할 10일 개인중고차매매 기회다. 경매 k5중고차 품질보증 구입할 될 있는 중고차매도 좋은 주말 진행될 직접 페스티벌 홈페이지를 금액의 통해 기관을 페스티벌 소비자가 코란도c중고차 믿을만한중고차사이트 기대된다. 현장에서 양일간 확실한 좋은 수 수 가능하며, 자동차매입 수 확보한 합리적 품질 있다. 차량 중고차를 문경 SM7할부 인피니티중고차 있는 thread.title: Elektrokonzern: Siemens erwägt bei Jobabbau Verlagerung von Aufgaben
thread.title_full: Elektrokonzern: Siemens erwägt bei Jobabbau Verlagerung von Aufgaben

posts.title: Elektrokonzern: Siemens erwägt bei Jobabbau Verlagerung von Aufgaben
posts.text:
Siemens erwägt bei Jobabbau Verlagerung von Aufgaben 10:28 Uhr Elektrokonzern Siemens erwägt bei Jobabbau Verlagerung von Aufgaben Der Elektrokonzern Siemens prüft beim geplanten Stellenabbau in der Kraftwerkssparte auch die Verlagerung von Aufgaben an Standorte in strukturschwachen Regionen. Mitte November sollen die Pläne mit den Arbeitnehmervertretern im Wirtschaftsausschuss besprochen werden. Foto: Rainer Jensen, dpa (Symbol) 
Am Ende des Tages werde es darauf ankommen, eine gewisse Solidarität zwischen allen Beteiligten zu schaffen, hieß es am Montagabend aus Konzernkreisen. Hintergrund sind die befürchteten drastischen Einschnitte in der Kraftwerkssparte Power & Gas. Auch bei den Aktionären wolle man dafür werben, beim Drang nach Profitabilität etwas nachzugeben, hieß es aus den Firmenkreisen. 
In der Kraftwerkssparte sowie im Geschäftsfeld Prozessindustrie und Antriebe will Siemens wohl mehrere tausend Jobs streichen. Auch Standortschließungen werden befürchtet, so etwa für eine Fabrik im sächsischen Görlitz. Mitte November sollen die Pläne mit den Arbeitnehmervertretern im Wirtschaftsausschuss besprochen werden, wie Siemens-Personalchefin in der vergangenen Woche der Deutschen Presse-Agentur gesagt hatte. ANZEIGE 
Power & Gas leidet auch angesichts des Booms für erneuerbare Energien unter einem Nachfrageschwund bei großen Gasturbinen mit Preisdruck und Überkapazitäten. dpa

thread.section_title: Space: New to Qlik Sense | Qlik Community
thread.title: Current Measure displayed in subtitle?
thread.title_full: Current Measure displayed in subtitle? | Qlik Community

posts.author: omar bensalem
posts.text:
I'll invite not to use alternative measure to achieve this but as follow:
Let's assume you have 3 measures :
1) sum(measure1)
2) sum(measure2)
3) sum(measure3)
first thing to do :
in the script, create a new table:
Measures:
load * inline [
Measure , MeasureID
Measure1, 1
Measure2, 2
Measure3, 3
];
Once done, on your presentation, add the new field Measure as a filter :
Now, in you chart, you'll only ONE MEASURE:
if(MeasureID=1, sum(measure1),
if(MeasureID=2,sum(measure2),
if(MeasureID=3,sum(measure3)
)))
And as a title: ='The selected measure is : '&Measure
The user will only have to choose a Measure from the filter to have it shown in the graph.
Hope this was clear

posts.author: youm7.com
posts.title: ترامب: مستعد لاستخدام الخيار العسكرى ضد كوريا الشمالية إذا لزم الامر
posts.text:
(أ ف ب) 
أعلن الرئيس الأمريكى دونالد ترامب، اليوم الثلاثاء، استعداده لاستخدام الخيار العسكرى ضد كوريا الشمالية "إذا لزم الأمر، مؤكدا  أن التحالف بين سيول وواشنطن أقوى من أى وقت مضى. 
وقال الرئيس الأمريكى أن نظيره الصينى شى جينبينغ لعب دورا "مفيدا جدا" فى الملف الكورى الشمالى، معربا عن أمله فى أن تقوم موسكو بالامر نفسه .
وقال ترامب فى مؤتمره الصحفى مع نظيره الكورى الجنوبى مون جاي-ان "نأمل ان تلعب روسيا دور مفيدا مشابها ".
والتقى الرئيس الأمريكى، دونالد ترامب، اليوم الثلاثاء، بالقوات الأمريكية فى كوريا الجنوبية، ضمن زيارته للعاصمة الكورية الجنوبية، سول، وعلى هامش قمته مع نظيره الكورى الجنوبى، "مون جيه إن".
والتقى ترامب، بالقوات الأمريكية، وعقد مع قادة القوات المشتركة الأمريكية، والكورية الجنوبية، مؤتمرًا صحفيًا، إضافة إلى تناوله وجبة الغداء مع القوات، وتبادل الحديث معهم، قبل استكمال جدول أعمال زيارته، وحضر ذلك اللقاء وزير الخارجية الأمريكى، ريكس تيلرسون، وفى نهايته، التقطوا صورة تذكارية مع القوات الأمريكية.


موضوعات متعلقة.. العالم هذا الصباح.. بالصور.. الولايات المتحدة تشيد بالإجراءات السعودية فى فضح دور إيران باليمن.. تظاهرات ضد ترامب بكوريا الجنوبية تحت عنوان "لا للحرب"..ومجلس الأمن يحث ميانمار على وقف استخدام القوة مع الروهينجا بالصور.. بدء محادثات قمة بين ترامب ورئيس كوريا الجنوبية فى سول بالصور والفيديو.. ترامب يجتمع بالقوات الأمريكية بكوريا الجنوبية خلال زيارته

Çankaya Belediyesi Sahipsiz Sokak Hayvanları Bakım ve Rehabilitasyon Merkezi, Ekim ayı içerisinde 167 hayvanı sahiplendirdi. 
Çankaya Belediyesi Sahipsiz Sokak Hayvanları Bakım ve Rehabilitasyon Merkezi, Ekim ayı içerisinde bin 357 hayvanın tedavi işlemini gerçekleştirdi, 167 hayvanı ise sahiplendirdi. Yaklaşan kış ayı öncesi aşılama çalışmalarına da ağırlık veren ekipler, 334 sokak hayvanına kuduz, bronchin, mantar, karma aşılarını yaptı. Sokak hayvanlarının popülasyonunu belirli bir seviyede tutmak için kısırlaştırma çalışmalarını da yoğunlaştıran Çankaya Belediyesi Sahipsiz Sokak Hayvanları Bakım ve Rehabilitasyon Merkezi veterinerleri, 340 hayvanın kısırlaştırma işlemini yaptı. Kısırlaştırmada geleneksel yöntemin yanı sıra laparoskopik yöntemi de kullanan veterinerlerin bu sayede daha hızlı operasyon yapabildiği belirtildi.

thread.title_full: From rags to riches to rags - News - telegram.com - Worcester, MA

posts.author: Terry Ingano Strange But True
posts.title: From rags to riches to rags - News
posts.text:
From rags to riches to rags Tuesday Nov 7, 2017 at 6:00 AM
By Terry Ingano Strange But True
It was the early 1930s and, although long removed from World War I, many local veterans were still hurting from the war — mentally, physically and emotionally. Along with that, the Great Depression was just beginning and many local families were in dire straits.
His name is not important, but a local World War I veteran, living on Green Street, was having a very difficult time. The war had taken a heavy toll on him and, after only one year on the front, he had spent time afterwards in a rehabilitation center. Now he was out of work and barely able to support his wife and three children. His only real asset was his veteran’s insurance policy, which he would borrow against as often as possible because of his desperate situation.
When he could no longer obtain a loan against his insurance, he decided to contact U.S. Senator David I. Walsh, former governor of the state, and a man known to be able to help his fellow Clintonians.
He met with the senator and gave him all of his military documents and personal material in the hope that he could help in some way — and Walsh did find something — something that nobody expected. It appeared that one E.B. Palmer, of Clyde, N.Y., had been appointed the guardian of this local vet back when he was hospitalized in New York after the war and unable to handle his own financial affairs; however, the local vet had never heard of Mr. Palmer and never knew the government had assigned him a guardian during that time.
Through the senator’s many contacts, a meeting was set up between the senator and Mr. Palmer. Palmer announced at the meeting that he had indeed been appointed a guardian of this veteran on July 18, 1925, and had been receiving - and investing - his monthly disability check. Yet that money was never requested or claimed by the desperate veteran. Palmer went on to say that every month, a sum of money was sent in his ward’s name and he had invested it, then amounting to $5,000 in gold bonds and another $2,000 in cash.
Needless to say, our local vet was totally overwhelmed when he learned that, instead of being penniless and without work, he really was sitting on about $7,000 in assets —a lot of money in the 1930s. The Item headline, “From Poverty to Comparative Riches,” said it all and our vet’s friends and neighbors — in fact, the entire town — was thrilled for him and his family.
I love happy endings. Unfortunately, I cannot change history, despite current trends.
About 10 days later, the Item headline read, “Case of Mistaken Identity” and you can figure out the rest of the story. Apparently, at the same time the local vet had approached his senator, he had also referred his case to the American Red Cross. Through the work of Barbara Littlejohn, the Red Cross local service coordinator, the Veteran’s Bureau in Washington was already looking into this case. It was the government that found out that the local vet was not the one assigned to Mr. Palmer — it was another man with a very similar name (one letter difference) — who lived in New York City. That particular vet was still in a rehabilitation hospital in New York City since the end of the war, while the local vet had only been in that same hospital for a year after the war.
The case of mistaken identity took its toll on the entire community, but within the next year or so, both the state and federal government instituted new ways to help World War I veterans and our local vet — and many others — did get some satisfaction with slightly increased financial benefits.
Rags to riches and back to rags, a true local sob story if I’ve ever heard one.
Terry Ingano is a Clinton historian and former school superintendent.
